    • Class Game.FireAttack extends Sprite implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • shootingPlayer

          Player shootingPlayer
          The Player this FireAttack belongs to

        • isMovingRight

          boolean isMovingRight
          a boolean determining the direction of the movement of the FireAttack (according to the Sprite.isLookingRight() method)

      • Serialized Fields

    • Class Game.MoveableCharacter extends javax.swing.JComponent implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • x

          int x
          The positions of the MoveableCharacter on the X and Y axes

        • y

          int y
          The positions of the MoveableCharacter on the X and Y axes

        • WIDTH

          int WIDTH
          The width and the height of the MoveableCharacter

        • HEIGHT

          int HEIGHT
          The width and the height of the MoveableCharacter

        • speedX

          int speedX
          The speeds of the MoveableCharacter on the X and Y axes

        • speedY

          int speedY
          The speeds of the MoveableCharacter on the X and Y axes

        • isJumping

          boolean isJumping
          This is a boolean regarding the current state of the MoveableCharacter:
          isJumping is true when the MoveableCharacter is in the middle of a jump

        • onTheGround

          boolean onTheGround
          This is a boolean regarding the current state of the MoveableCharacter:
          onTheGround is true when the MoveableCharacter is standing on an instance of a Surface

    • Class Game.Player extends Sprite implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • socket

          java.net.Socket socket
          the client's socket

        • inputStreamFromServer

          java.io.BufferedReader inputStreamFromServer
          the client's input stream

        • outputStreamToServer

          java.io.DataOutputStream outputStreamToServer
          the client's output stream

        • index

          int index
          the index of the player (received by the server)

        • health

          int health
          the health of the player

        • attackingChar

          char attackingChar
          the attacking char of the player:
          N - not attacking
          F - attacking

        • attacks

          java.util.ArrayList<E> attacks
          an ArrayList containing the attacks of the Player.
          See Also:
          FireAttack

    • Class Game.Sprite extends MoveableCharacter implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • COSTUMES

          java.awt.Image[][] COSTUMES
          A double dimensional array representing the different states (images) of the sprite

        • bufferedImage

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage bufferedImage
          The original image of the sprite

        • ROWS

          int ROWS
          The number of rows and columns in the original sprite image (i.e the number of rows and columns in the Sprite.COSTUMES field

        • COLUMNS

          int COLUMNS
          The number of rows and columns in the original sprite image (i.e the number of rows and columns in the Sprite.COSTUMES field

        • SUB_IMG_WIDTH

          int SUB_IMG_WIDTH
          The height and width of the costumes of the sprite

        • SUB_IMG_HEIGHT

          int SUB_IMG_HEIGHT
          The height and width of the costumes of the sprite

        • currentRow

          int currentRow
          The current row/column, representing the current costume, in the Sprite.COSTUMES field

        • currentColumn

          int currentColumn
          The current row/column, representing the current costume, in the Sprite.COSTUMES field

        • isLookingRight

          boolean isLookingRight
          A boolean determines the side the Sprite is looking at (in order to set the correct Sprite.currentRow)

        • costumeConst

          int costumeConst
          The costume constant of the Sprite.
          The images of the sprite are divided to rows and columns. Each two rows represents the same type of image, but looking to the other direction. Therefore, the costumeConst determines which type of the sprite images needs to be used:
          0 - first and second rows
          2 - third and fourth rows
          4 - fifth and sixth rows
          etc...
